definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: couch, bed (poet.);—sf. [[יְחוּעִי]] Ge 49:4; pl. cstr. [[יְחוּעֵי]] 1Ch 5:1; sf. [[יְחוּעָָי]] Job 17:13 + 2 t. (+ 1 K 1Ki 6:5, 1Ki 6:6, 1Ki 6:10 Kt, v. [[יׇחִיעַ]]); couch, bed, of wedlock or concubinage, Ge 49:4 (J), hence 1Ch 5:1; in gen. Ps 63:7, [[עֶרֶשׂ יְחוּעָָי]] Ps 132:3; [[בַּחשֶׁח]] [[רִפַּדְתִּי יְחוּעָָי]] Job 17:13 (‖[[אִם־אֲקַיֶּה שְׁאוֹל בֵּתִי]]; cf. Ps 139:8).
